extension.name: Emundus - Send ZIP file to user.
extension.author: eMundus
extension.description: This plugin sends a ZIP of the file when it is changed to a certain status or when it is deleted.

field.name: delete_email
field.label: Email to send on delete
field.description: The ID or lbl of the email to be sent containing the archive on delete, leave blank to not send.

field.name: event_status
field.label: Status values to trigger email
field.description: The steps of the status which trigger the status email, can be multiple steps separated by comma.

field.name: status_email
field.label: Email to send on update to status
field.description: The ID or lbl of the email to be sent containing the archive when the file reaches the specified status, leave blank to not send mails.

field.name: zip_attachments
field.label: ZIP contains attachments
field.description: Specify whether the ZIP file should contain the files attachments or not.

field.name: zip_evaluation
field.label: ZIP contains evaluations
field.description: Specify whether the ZIP file should contain the files evaluations or not.

field.name: zip_decision
field.label: ZIP contains decision
field.description: Specify whether the ZIP file should contain the files decision or not.
